# Imports & Libraries Setup

```{r}
renv::snapshot()
source("../renv/activate.R")
renv::init()
renv::status()

required_packages <- c("rmarkdown", "tidyverse", "visNetwork", "igraph")

for (pkg in required_packages) {
  if (!requireNamespace(pkg, quietly = TRUE)) {
    install.packages(pkg, repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")
  }
}
install.packages(c('rmarkdown', 'tidyverse', 'igraph', 'visNetwork', 'igraph'))
renv::snapshot()
library(rmarkdown)
library(tidyverse)
library(visNetwork)
library(igraph)
```
